title: Modernising the Contact Center for Always-On Service: AI Promises, Human Reality
summary: The article discusses the role of AI in modernizing contact centers, emphasizing that while AI can extend service coverage, it can also downgrade customer experiences and increase the emotional burden on agents if not properly managed. It highlights the importance of designing proper escalation processes in AI implementations. The article was published on January 21, 2026.
hook: AI in contact centers: a promise or a burden for agents?

title: American Airlines Expands App Features to Give Customers More Control During Travel Disruptions
summary: American Airlines has expanded its app features to offer customers more control during travel disruptions. The new self-service tools focus on transparency, personalization, and real-time journey management, enhancing customer experience during travel disruptions.
hook: American Airlines enhances CX with new app features for travel disruptions.

title: CRM tools and strategy
summary: The article discusses the integration of AI into operations and how it influences enterprise software decisions. It highlights the importance of strong assumptions about data, people, and control for successful AI implementation. The focus is on the shift of AI decisions from capability questions to operational considerations.
hook: AI's shift from experimentation to operations impacts enterprise software decisions.

title: Trends and Innovation
summary: The article is a sponsored content by IT vendors, promoting ServiceNow solutions for improving employee satisfaction and customer service experience. The content is focused on how ServiceNow CSM can aid in providing superior customer service. It does not provide any specific insights or trends in the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
hook: Explore how ServiceNow CSM enhances customer service experience!

title: Meet Your Business Goals by Transforming IT Service Operations
summary: The article discusses the challenges of implementing cloud-first initiatives and GenAI while protecting sensitive business data, improving productivity amidst talent shortages, and thinking organization-wide while dealing with disparate silos. It suggests that traditional IT approaches are overwhelmed and promotes ServiceNow ServiceOps solutions. However, the article does not provide detailed information on how these solutions specifically relate to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
hook: Overcoming IT challenges with ServiceNow ServiceOps solutions!
